sentences.en: Anything short of that, he said, is a " nonstarter. "
sentences.cn: 他说任何缺少这一条件的 议 案都不会成功.

sentences.en: In its present form the scheme is a non-starter.
sentences.cn: 这一方案照其现有模式是行不通的。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, this strategy is a nonstarter for fighting computer viruses.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 这种策略对于计算机病毒是无效的.

trans.tran_cn: 弃权出赛的马，早就无成功希望的人
trans.tran_en: an idea, a plan, or a person that has no chance of success
